description: Application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) for minor-material amendments for the variation of Condition (2 - Approved Plans) of planning permission (DC/19/112087; Appeal Ref APP/C5690/W/20/3252615 dated 13/08/21 amended under DC/22/129098 dated 10/03/23 and DC/24/137715 dated 16/12/24; for the joint use of the approved cycle store for the purposes of air source heat pumps and lockable cycle storage; additional cycle parking facilities, re-arrangement of the foyer roof glazing; introduction of two small air conditioning units on the rear section of the hall roof, raising the height of the office window  on the north east corner of the hall Building; meshing to the fabric of the host building and installation of a light-weight, subtly 'halo' illuminated, aluminium cross on the front elevation of the hall at St Mildred's Church, St Mildreds Road, SE12.
site_name: ST MILDREDS CHURCH, ST MILDREDS ROAD, LONDON, SE12 0RA
